LocaleLayout.title: Lali Solari
LocaleLayout.description: Explore the personal portfolio of Lali Solari, an Argentinian artist based in Barcelona, Spain. Lali's mixed-media creations on paper and canvas combine textured acrylics with shimmering metallic watercolors, inviting viewers to immerse themselves in each piece and discover unique details with every look.

Home.metaDescription: Home page for Lali Solari showcasing her various collections, with links to purchase her works, learn more about her, and contact her.

Error.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
Error.body: We couldn't find the page you were looking for. It might have been removed, or you may have mistyped the address.

NotFound.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for cannot be found.
